H0.text: If it is 3 a.m. in Nevada, what time is it in Montana. 2am

H1.text: If it is 3 a.m. in Nevada, what time is it in Montana. 1am

H2.text: If it is 3 a.m. in Nevada, what time is it in Montana. 5am

H3.text: If it is 3 a.m. in Nevada, what time is it in Montana. 4am

A4.text: The Pacific Time Zone is one hour behind the Mountain Time Zone.
